name: Mama
summary_text: After a young couple take in their two nieces, they suspect that a supernatural spirit named Mama has latched onto their family.

name: Secret in Their Eyes
summary_text: A tight-knit team of rising investigators, along with their supervisor, is suddenly torn apart when they discover that one of their own teenage daughters has been brutally murdered.

name: Demonic
summary_text: A young woman unleashes terrifying demons when supernatural forces at the root of a decades-old rift between mother and daughter are ruthlessly revealed.

name: The Five
summary_text: A mystery series created by author Harlan Coben. Jesse, a five-year-old boy, goes missing. Twenty years later, his DNA shows up at a crime scene.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
summary_text: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

name: Cheaper by the Dozen
summary_text: With his wife doing a book tour, a father of twelve must handle a new job and his unstable brood.

name: The Rain
summary_text: After a brutal virus wipes out most of the population, two young siblings embark on a perilous search for safety.

name: The A List
summary_text: Mia arrives at an idyllic summer camp expecting to be Queen Bee, but the "holiday of a lifetime" turns into a twisted nightmare.

name: Six
summary_text: Navy SEAL Team Six attempt to eliminate a Taliban leader in Afghanistan when they discover an American citizen working with the enemy.

name: Primer
summary_text: Four friends/fledgling entrepreneurs, knowing that there's something bigger and more innovative than the different error-checking devices they've built, wrestle over their new invention.

name: Wet Hot American Summer
summary_text: Set on the last day of camp, in the hot summer of 1981, a group of counselors try to complete their unfinished business before the day ends.

name: All My Life
summary_text: A couple's wedding plans are thrown off course when the groom is diagnosed with liver cancer.

name: End of Days
summary_text: At the end of the century, Satan visits New York in search of a bride. It's up to an ex-cop who now runs an elite security outfit to stop him.

name: Anastasia
summary_text: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

name: Kingpin
summary_text: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

name: The Twilight Zone
summary_text: An updated version of the classic anthology series featuring various tales of science fiction, mystery, and horror.

name: Splinter
summary_text: Trapped in an isolated gas station by a voracious Splinter parasite that transforms its still-living victims into deadly hosts, a young couple and an escaped convict must find a way to work together to survive this primal terror.

name: Starsky & Hutch
summary_text: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear".

name: Jiu Jitsu
summary_text: Every six years, an ancient order of jiu-jitsu fighters joins forces to battle a vicious race of alien invaders. But when a celebrated war hero goes down in defeat, the fate of the planet and mankind hangs in the balance.

name: Angels & Demons
summary_text: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works with a nuclear physicist to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican during one of the significant events within the church.

name: Traffic
summary_text: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a crack addict. Two DEA agents protect an informant. A jailed drug baron's wife attempts to carry on the family business.

name: License to Kill
summary_text: After capturing a drug lord, Felix Leiter is left for dead and his wife is murdered. James Bond goes rogue and seeks vengeance on those responsible, as he infiltrates an organisation posing as a hitman.

name: Angel Heart
summary_text: A private investigator is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer named Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.

name: Me, Myself & Irene
summary_text: A nice-guy cop with Dissociative Identity Disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.

name: American Reunion
summary_text: Jim, Michelle, Stifler, and their friends reunite in East Great Falls, Michigan for their high school reunion.

name: The Book of Eli
summary_text: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

name: Planes, Trains & Automobiles
summary_text: A man must struggle to travel home for Thanksgiving with a lovable oaf of a shower curtain ring salesman as his only companion.

name: Jumper
summary_text: A teenager with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

name: The Essex Serpent
summary_text: The Essex Serpent follows newly widowed Cora, who, having being released from an abusive marriage, relocates from Victorian London to the small village of Aldwinter in Essex, intrigued by a...                See full summary »
Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.

name: Star Trek Into Darkness
summary_text: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.

name: Daredevil
summary_text: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

name: Annette
summary_text: A stand-up comedian and his opera singer wife have a 2 year old daughter with a surprising gift.

name: Revenge of the Nerds
summary_text: At Adams College, a group of bullied outcasts and misfits resolve to fight back for their peace and self-respect.

name: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
summary_text: Series of unrelated short stories covering elements of crime, horror, drama, and comedy about people of different backgrounds committing murders, suicides, thefts, and other sorts of crime caused by certain motivations, perceived or not.

name: Predators
summary_text: A group of elite warriors parachute into an unfamiliar jungle and are hunted by members of a merciless alien race.

name: Family Matters
summary_text: The Winslow family deal with various misadventures, many of them caused by their pesky next-door neighbor, ultra-nerd Steve Urkel.

name: George of the Jungle
summary_text: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.

name: Toy Story 2
summary_text: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

name: Private Eyes
summary_text: Former professional hockey player Matt Shade partners with private eye Angie Everett to solve crimes around Toronto.

name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
summary_text: When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek "The Hidden World", a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.

name: Inherent Vice
summary_text: In 1970, drug-fueled Los Angeles private investigator Larry "Doc" Sportello investigates the disappearance of a former girlfriend.

name: Fresh, Fried and Crispy
summary_text: Passionate about food and ready for fun, critic Daym Drops drops in on America's smokin' hot spots for the best, freshest takes on fried food.

name: The Politician
summary_text: Payton Hobart, a student from Santa Barbara, has known since age seven that he's going to be President of the United States. But first he'll have to navigate the most treacherous political landscape of all: Saint Sebastian High School.

name: One Night in Miami...
summary_text: A fictional account of one incredible night where icons Muhammad Ali, Malcolm X, Sam Cooke, and Jim Brown gathered discussing their roles in the Civil Rights Movement and cultural upheaval of the 60s.

name: Summer Holiday
summary_text: A fabulous 60s Musical - 4 London Bus mechanics strike up a deal with London Transport. They do up a double decker London Bus, drive it around Europe as a hotel and if they make it they ...                See full summary »

name: Wonder Woman
summary_text: The adventures of the greatest of the female superheroes.

name: The Judge
summary_text: Big-city lawyer Hank Palmer returns to his childhood home where his father, the town's judge, is suspected of murder. Hank sets out to discover the truth and, along the way, reconnects with his estranged family.

name: The Time Machine
summary_text: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

name: Adrift
summary_text: A true story of survival, as a young couple's chance encounter leads them first to love, and then on the adventure of a lifetime as they face one of the most catastrophic hurricanes in recorded history.

name: Jeepers Creepers
summary_text: A brother and sister driving home through isolated countryside for spring break encounter a flesh-eating creature which is in the midst of its ritualistic eating spree.

name: The Tax Collector
summary_text: A "tax collector" working for a local crime lord finds his family's safety compromised when the rival of his boss shows up in L.A. and upends the business.

name: Triumph
summary_text: Inspired by a real story, a determined high school senior strives to be a wrestler one last time despite having cerebral palsy and goes to extreme lengths, crushing obstacles and inspiring others along his journey to prove his abilities.

name: Kevin Can Wait
summary_text: A retired police officer is on a fresh career path as he rises to the challenge of being a newly single dad. His kids are grateful to him for making sure they're okay, but decide it's time for him to get out of the house, so they turn to Vanessa (Leah Remini), his former police partner, for help.

name: Beautiful Creatures
summary_text: Ethan Wate longs to escape his small southern town. He meets a mysterious new girl, Lena Duchannes. Together, they uncover dark secrets about their respective families, their history, and their town.

name: Across the Universe
summary_text: The music of The Beatles and the Vietnam War form the backdrop for the romance between an upper-class American girl and a poor Liverpudlian artist.

name: Spy Game
summary_text: Retiring CIA agent Nathan Muir recalls his training of Tom Bishop while working against agency politics to free him from his Chinese captors.

name: Host
summary_text: Six friends hire a medium to hold a seance via Zoom during lockdown, but they get far more than they bargained for as things quickly go wrong.

name: Miranda
summary_text: Socially inept Miranda always gets into awkward situations; working in her joke shop with best friend Stevie, being hounded by her pushy mother, and around her crush Gary.

name: Fire in the Sky
summary_text: An Arizona logger mysteriously disappears for five days in an alleged encounter with a flying saucer in 1975. His co-workers endure ridicule and contempt as they are wrongly accused of murder.

name: The Rocketeer
summary_text: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high-flying masked hero.

name: The Start Up
summary_text: Add a Plot

name: Elysium
summary_text: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

name: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
summary_text: Alice returns to where the nightmare began: The Hive in Raccoon City, where the Umbrella Corporation is gathering its forces for a final strike against the only remaining survivors of the apocalypse.

name: The Dick Van Dyke Show
summary_text: The misadventures of a TV writer both at work and at home.

name: Tin Star
summary_text: Ex undercover UK cop turned police chief of a small town in the Canadian Rockies does what he must to defend his family from those in power whether it's the oilmen, the preachers or the gangsters.

name: Salvation
summary_text: An MIT grad student and a tech superstar bring a low-level Pentagon official a staggering discovery--that an asteroid is just six months away from colliding with Earth.

name: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
summary_text: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.
One man's journey to the future to save a dying world.

name: Bridge of Spies
summary_text: During the Cold War, an American lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange of the spy for the Soviet captured American U2 spy plane pilot, Francis Gary Powers.

name: Dystopia
summary_text: Group of Swedes, get into an abandoned factory deep in the wilderness for a live roleplay to push their physical and mental limits. Game turns dead serious when series of mysteries unfold, awakening dark forces in each of them.

name: Homecoming
summary_text: An anthology series centered around the mysterious Geist Group, an unconventional wellness company and their equally unorthodox program, the Homecoming Initiative.

name: The Neighborhood
summary_text: A friendly guy from the Midwest tries to fit in in a tough L.A. neighborhood.

name: The Backyardigans
summary_text: Uniqua, Pablo, Tyrone, Tasha, and Austin are a group of young friends who get together to play in the backyard they share. Each day, their imaginations transform that backyard into a different photo-realistic landscape.

name: Pitch Black
summary_text: A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur.

name: Cloverfield
summary_text: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

name: Dungeons & Dragons
summary_text: Plot undisclosed

name: The Bourne Ultimatum
summary_text: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

name: The Mary Tyler Moore Show
summary_text: The lives and trials of a young single woman and her friends, both at work and at home.

name: Lost Girl
summary_text: Bo is a supernatural being who challenges her clan's way of life.

name: Ghost Adventures
summary_text: Zak Bagans, Aaron Goodwin, Billy Tolley, and Jay Wasley investigate the scariest, most notorious, haunted places in the world.

name: Live by Night
summary_text: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan.

name: Deadly Illusions
summary_text: After a bestselling novelist suffering from writer's block hires a new nanny for her children, the line between fiction and reality starts to blur.

name: King Arthur
summary_text: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

name: Major League
summary_text: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians puts together a purposely horrible team so they'll lose and she can move the team. But when the plot is uncovered, they start winning just to spite her.

name: All-Star Weekend
summary_text: Two buddies form a rivalry over their favorite American basketball player.

name: Margin Call
summary_text: Follows the key people at an investment bank, over a 24-hour period, during the early stages of the 2008 financial crisis.

name: Spider-Man 4: Fan Film
summary_text: Spider-Man returns to face his greatest challenge yet as he faces off against The Vulture.

name: Felicity
summary_text: A young fresh out of high school girl follows her high school crush to college to be near him.

name: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
summary_text: Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days.

name: The Avengers
summary_text: A quirky spy show of the adventures of eccentrically suave British Agent John Steed and his predominately female partners.

name: Vivy: Fluorite Eye's Song
summary_text: The female looking and first autonomous AI named Diva is created for one mission to make everyone happy by singing. Shortly Diva is confronted by an unknown "program" from the future with objective to make Diva join him and destroy AIs.

name: The Journey
summary_text: An animated tale based on the history and culture of ancient Arabia.

name: Haseen Dillruba
summary_text: Under investigation as a suspect in her husband's murder, a wife reveals details of their thorny marriage that seem to only further blur the truth.

name: Saturday Night Fever
summary_text: Anxious about his future after high school, a 19-year-old Italian-American from Brooklyn tries to escape the harsh reality of his bleak family life by dominating the dance floor at the local disco.

name: The Raid: Redemption
summary_text: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

name: Unstoppable
summary_text: With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.

name: Halloween
summary_text: Laurie Strode confronts her long-time foe Michael Myers, the masked figure who has haunted her since she narrowly escaped his killing spree on Halloween night four decades ago.

name: Fantasy Island
summary_text: The mysterious Mr. Roarke runs a unique resort island in the Pacific Ocean that can fulfill literally any fantasy requested by guests, but they rarely turn out as expected.

name: Tenacious D in the Pick of Destiny
summary_text: To become the greatest band of all time, two slacker, wannabe-rockers set out on a quest to steal a legendary guitar pick that gives its holders incredible guitar skills, from a maximum security Rock and Roll museum.

name: The Three Stooges
summary_text: While trying to save their childhood orphanage, Moe, Larry and Curly inadvertently stumble into a murder plot and wind up starring in a reality television show.

name: Sherlock Holmes 3
summary_text: The plot is unknown at this time.

name: Here After
summary_text: A dark fantasy-comedy about the meaning of love in the afterlife.

name: The Secret Life of the American Teenager
summary_text: 15 year old Amy ends up pregnant after one night at band camp, throwing her whole life upside down. It doesn't help that she's now going to school with that guy.

name: Mystery Men
summary_text: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillain threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

name: CHIPS
summary_text: A rookie officer is teamed with a hardened pro at the California Highway Patrol, though the newbie soon learns his partner is really an undercover Fed investigating a heist that may involve some crooked cops.

name: 102 Dalmatians
summary_text: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after the puppies once more.

name: Monster
summary_text: A smart, likeable, 17-year-old film student from Harlem sees his world turned upside down when he's charged with a murder. We follow his dramatic journey through a complex legal battle.

name: Midnight Cowboy
summary_text: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.

name: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
summary_text: The further adventures of Ant-Man and the Wasp.

name: Motherless Brooklyn
summary_text: In 1950s New York, a lonely private detective afflicted with Tourette's Syndrome ventures to solve the murder of his mentor and only friend.

name: Before Sunset
summary_text: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

name: A History of Violence
summary_text: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core.

name: All Creatures Great and Small
summary_text: The numerous adventures of a friendly staff at a country veterinarian practice in 1930s to 1940s Yorkshire.

name: The Secret: Dare to Dream
summary_text: A feature film adaptation of the self-help book, 'The Secret', which focuses on the power of positive thinking.

name: Moloch
summary_text: In an industrial seaside town, strangers burst into flames for no reason. Suicides? Murders? Supernatural phenomena? To find out, Louise, a young journalist, and Gabriel, a psychiatrist, go to investigate.

name: Welcome to Marwen
summary_text: A victim of a brutal attack finds a unique and beautiful therapeutic outlet to help him through his recovery process.

name: Robin Hood
summary_text: In twelfth-century England, Robin Longstride and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.
A simple yet proud farmer in the year 1922 conspires to murder his wife for financial gain, convincing his teenage son to assist. But their actions have unintended consequences.

name: Cry-Baby
summary_text: In 1950s Baltimore, a bad boy with a heart of gold wins the love of a good girl, whose boyfriend sets out for revenge.

name: Trainwreck
summary_text: Having thought that monogamy was never possible, a commitment-phobic career woman may have to face her fears when she meets a good guy.

name: Recalled
summary_text: Disturbing visions about chilling accidents. Post-traumatic memory loss. And a woman's desperate fight to uncover the truth about her past

name: Hell's Kitchen
summary_text: World renowned chef Gordon Ramsay puts aspiring young chefs through rigorous cooking challenges and dinner services at his restaurant in Hollywood, "Hell's Kitchen".

name: Bridget Jones's Diary
summary_text: Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.

name: 8 Simple Rules
summary_text: The Hennessy clan -- mother Cate, daughters Bridget and Kerry, and son Rory -- look to one another for guidance and support after the death of Paul, the family patriarch. Cate's parents lend a hand.

name: Batman: The Long Halloween, Part One
summary_text: Batman investigates a murder spree that takes place on holidays.

name: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
summary_text: Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.

name: Newness
summary_text: In contemporary Los Angeles, two millennials navigating a social media-driven hookup culture begin a relationship that pushes both emotional and physical boundaries.

name: Northern Exposure
summary_text: A newly graduated doctor is required to set up his practice in an eccentric Alaskan town.

name: Philadelphia
summary_text: When a man with HIV is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.

name: Big Time Rush
summary_text: Four hockey players from Minnesota aspire to become a boyband. Kendall, Logan, Carlos, and James embark on a life-changing journey and face challenges along the way.

name: The Darjeeling Limited
summary_text: A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other.

name: American Housewife
summary_text: A family comedy narrated by Katie, a strong-willed mother, raising her flawed family in a wealthy town filled with perfect wives and their perfect offspring.

name: Uncle Frank
summary_text: In 1973, when Frank Bledsoe and his 18-year-old niece Beth take a road trip from Manhattan to Creekville, South Carolina, for the family patriarch's funeral, they're unexpectedly joined by Frank's lover, Walid.

name: Rambo: First Blood Part II
summary_text: Rambo returns to the jungles of Vietnam on a mission to infiltrate an enemy base-camp and rescue the American POWs still held captive there.

name: When Harry Met Sally...
summary_text: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

name: You Should Have Left
summary_text: A former banker, his actress wife, and their spirited daughter book a vacation at an isolated modern home in the Welsh countryside where nothing is quite as it seems.

name: Life
summary_text: In 1932, two strangers are wrongfully convicted and develop a strong friendship in prison that lasts them through the 20th century.

name: Buckskin
summary_text: Set in 1820, a Texan fur trapper journeys into the mysterious Buckskin woods in the hopes of saving a lost young boy.

name: The Boondocks
summary_text: Adventures of two boys, Riley and Huey Freeman, who undergo a culture clash when they move from Chicago to the suburbs to live with their grandfather.

name: The Man from Toronto
summary_text: The world's deadliest assassin and New York's biggest screw-up are mistaken for each other at an Airbnb rental.

name: Our Girl
summary_text: Drama following the extraordinary adventures of female medics in the British Army.

name: Dead Man Down
summary_text: In New York City, a crime lord's right-hand man is helped by a woman seeking retribution.

name: Stumptown
summary_text: A sharp-witted Marine veteran becomes a private investigator in Portland, Oregon, where she takes care of her brother who has Down syndrome.

name: Come Away
summary_text: When their eldest brother dies, Peter and Alice seek to save their parents from despair until they are forced to choose between home and imagination, setting the stage for their iconic journeys into Wonderland and Neverland.

name: Tucker and Dale vs Evil
summary_text: Affable hillbillies Tucker and Dale are on vacation at their dilapidated mountain cabin when they are mistaken for murderers by a group of preppy college students.

name: Valley Girl
summary_text: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.

name: Hard Candy
summary_text: Hayley's a smart, charming teenage girl. Jeff's a handsome, smooth fashion photographer. An Internet chat, a coffee shop meet-up, an impromptu fashion shoot back at Jeff's place. Jeff thinks it's his lucky night. He's in for a surprise.

name: Turner & Hooch
summary_text: A detective solves crimes with the help of an oversized dog. TV adaptation of the 1989 film 'Turner and Hooch'.

name: Bad Boys II
summary_text: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.

name: D2: The Mighty Ducks
summary_text: Can Gordon's team win the Junior Goodwill Games in California in spite of all the set-backs?

name: The Vanished
summary_text: Story of a husband and wife that will stop at nothing to find their missing daughter, who disappeared on a family camping trip. When the police don't catch any leads, the duo take over.

name: Alex Rider
summary_text: Alex Rider is an ordinary teenager enlisted to work on behalf of MI6, where he uses skills he didn't know he had to become an extraordinary spy.

name: It's Always Fair Weather
summary_text: Three soldiers meet ten years after their last meeting in New York, and find out that they have little in common now.

name: My Best Friend's Wedding
summary_text: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

name: Easy Rider
summary_text: Two bikers head from L.A. to New Orleans through the open country and desert lands, and along the way they meet a man who bridges a counter-culture gap of which they had been unaware.

name: Lost in Space
summary_text: A space colony family struggles to survive when a spy/accidental stowaway throws their ship hopelessly off course.

name: Saved by the Bell
summary_text: A follow-up series to the 1990s sitcom. A group of California low-income high school students are transferred to Pacific Palisades' wealthy Bayside High, following a program by California Governor Zack Morris.

name: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
summary_text: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

name: The Choice
summary_text: Travis and Gabby first meet as neighbors in a small coastal town and wind up in a relationship that is tested by life's most defining events.

name: Perfect Strangers
summary_text: A high-strung and cynical man's life is never the same when his naive but good-natured cousin comes to America to live with him.

name: Royal Pains
summary_text: An unfairly discredited but brilliant diagnostic surgeon winds up working with his cheesy brother in the Hamptons as a concierge doctor to the uber-rich and ultra-elite.

name: Blood of Zeus
summary_text: A commoner living in ancient Greece, Heron discovers his true heritage as a son of Zeus, and his purpose: to save the world from a demonic army.

name: Killerman
summary_text: Two NYC money launderers make a quick drug deal. Things go wrong, as dirty cops are involved. One of the friends gets amnesia during their escape with the drugs and money.

name: Dracula Untold
summary_text: As his kingdom is being threatened by the Turks, young prince Vlad Tepes must become a monster feared by his own people in order to obtain the power needed to protect his own family, and the families of his kingdom.

name: An Officer and a Gentleman
summary_text: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.

name: Meet the Fockers
summary_text: All hell breaks loose when the Byrnes family meets the Focker family for the first time.

name: The Tree of Life
summary_text: The story of a family in Waco, Texas in 1956. The eldest son witnesses the loss of innocence and struggles with his parents' conflicting teachings.

name: Agatha and the Curse of Ishtar
summary_text: On an archaeological dig in Iraq, author Agatha Christie uncovers a series of murders.

name: Carlito's Way
summary_text: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

name: Tumbbad
summary_text: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

name: Red Sonja
summary_text: The fearless warrior Red Sonja sets out to avenge her family's murder and rid her kingdom from the tyrannical rule of evil Queen Gedren.

name: Yasuke
summary_text: He came from Africa and fought alongside a mighty feudal lord in brutal 16th century Japan. They called him the Black Samurai, and he became a legend.

name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
summary_text: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

name: The Monuments Men
summary_text: An unlikely World War II platoon is tasked to rescue art masterpieces from Nazi thieves and return them to their owners.

name: Crossing Jordan
summary_text: A "sexy, brilliant" Boston medical examiner. Despite a checkered career, Dr. Jordan Cavanaugh goes above and beyond to solve cases.

name: Honey Boy
summary_text: A young actor's stormy childhood and early adult years as he struggles to reconcile with his father and deal with his mental health.

name: Bordertown
summary_text: Quirky police detective, in Finland, delves into his mind palace to solve despicable crimes all the while trying to keep his family together. If Sherlock was based in Finland this would be it.

name: My Neighbor Totoro
summary_text: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

name: Who's the Boss?
summary_text: Tony Micelli, a retired baseball player, becomes the housekeeper of Angela Bower, an advertising executive in New York. Together they raise their kids, Samantha Micelli and Jonathan Bower, with help from Mona Robinson, Angela's man-crazy mother.

name: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
summary_text: A loving mom becomes compelled to reconnect with her creative passions after years of sacrificing herself for her family. Her leap of faith takes her on an epic adventure that jump-starts her life and leads to her triumphant rediscovery.

name: Chungking Express
summary_text: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal waitress at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

name: First Cow
summary_text: A skilled cook has traveled west and joined a group of fur trappers in Oregon, though he only finds true connection with a Chinese immigrant also seeking his fortune. Soon the two collaborate on a successful business.

name: Dante's Peak
summary_text: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

name: All the Money in the World
summary_text: The story of the kidnapping of 16-year-old John Paul Getty III and the desperate attempt by his devoted mother to convince his billionaire grandfather Jean Paul Getty to pay the ransom.

name: Blithe Spirit
summary_text: A spiritualist medium holds a seance for a writer suffering from writer's block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife, which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current wife of five years.

name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
summary_text: A team of teenagers with attitude are recruited to save Angel Grove from the evil witch, Rita Repulsa, and later, Lord Zedd, Emperor of all he sees, and their horde of monsters.

name: The Sum of All Fears
summary_text: CIA analyst Jack Ryan must stop the plans of a Neo-Nazi faction that threatens to induce a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia's President by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore, Maryland.

name: The Canterville Ghost
summary_text: The descendent of a ghost imprisoned for cowardice hopes to free the spirit by displaying courage when under duress.

name: The Mortuary Collection
summary_text: An eccentric mortician recounts several macabre and phantasmagorical tales that he's encountered in his distinguished career.

name: Crank
summary_text: Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops.

name: Walk the Line
summary_text: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Carl Perkins.

name: Sea of Thieves
summary_text: Four-player session open-world MMO based on a sea pirates theme, that let's players and their crew go on a journey to find treasure.

name: Burning
summary_text: Jong-su bumps into a girl who used to live in the same neighborhood, who asks him to look after her cat while she's on a trip to Africa. When back, she introduces Ben, a mysterious guy she met there, who confesses his secret hobby.

name: Adventureland
summary_text: In the summer of 1987, a college graduate takes a 'nowhere' job at his local amusement park, only to find it's the perfect course to get him prepared for the real world.

name: Family Ties
summary_text: Chronicles liberal ex-hippies Steven and Elyse Keaton, their conservative son Alex, daughters Mallory and Jennifer, and later, youngest child Andrew.

name: The Big Ugly
summary_text: Anglo-American relations go bad when London mob bosses invest in a West Virginia oil deal in hopes of laundering dirty money.

name: Staged
summary_text: David Tennant and Michael Sheen star as two actors whose West End play has been put on hold due to Covid-19, but whose director has persuaded them to carry on rehearsing online.

name: Apostle
summary_text: In 1905, a drifter on a dangerous mission to rescue his kidnapped sister tangles with a sinister religious cult on an isolated island.

name: Triangle
summary_text: Yacht passengers encounter mysterious weather conditions that force them to jump onto another ship, only to have the odd havoc increase.
In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

name: Hawaii Five-O
summary_text: The investigations of Hawaii Five-0, an elite branch of the Hawaii State Police answerable only to the governor and headed by stalwart Steve McGarrett.

name: Outlaw King
summary_text: A true David vs. Goliath story of how the 14th century Scottish 'Outlaw King' Robert the Bruce used cunning and bravery to defeat the much larger and better equipped occupying English army.

name: Endings, Beginnings
summary_text: A 30-something woman navigating through love and heartbreak over the course of one year. During that time, she will unlock the secrets to her life in a sudden turn of events and in the most surprising of places.

name: The 4400
summary_text: As the reappearance of 4,400 missing persons on a single day confounds the global community, federal agents on the case slowly discover the ways in which the victims have been changed.

name: Humans
summary_text: In a parallel present where the latest must-have gadget for any busy family is a 'Synth' - a highly-developed robotic servant that's so similar to a real human is transforming the way we live.

name: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
summary_text: An average aquarium cleaner house-sits for a gigolo, only to be forced to become one himself.

name: Grand Theft Auto V
summary_text: Three very different criminals team up for a series of heists in the corrupt city of Los Santos.

name: The Baker and the Beauty
summary_text: A blue-collar baker strikes up a relationship with an international superstar. US version of the Israeli romantic comedy series 'The Baker and the Beauty'.

name: A Ghost Story
summary_text: In this singular exploration of legacy, love, loss, and the enormity of existence, a recently deceased, white-sheeted ghost returns to his suburban home to try to reconnect with his bereft wife.

name: Ice Age: Collision Course
summary_text: When Scrat's acorn sends an asteroid to Earth, the Herd must find a way to stop the asteroid from hitting Earth with the help of a returning friend.

name: The Outpost
summary_text: Talon, the lone survivor of the Blackbloods, sets off to track her family's killers, and discovers her supernatural powers, which she must learn to harness.

name: The Elephant Man
summary_text: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

name: Agatha and the Midnight Murders
summary_text: As bombs fall on London, writer Agatha Christie considers selling a manuscript that will kill off her most famous creation.

name: The War of the Worlds
summary_text: In London during the Edwardian era, George and Amy's attempt to start a life together is interrupted by a Martian invasion of Earth.

name: The Contract
summary_text: A father and his son attempt to bring in an assassin to the authorities, but his dangerous associates have other plans.

name: Words on Bathroom Walls
summary_text: Diagnosed with a mental illness halfway through his senior year of high school, a witty, introspective teen struggles to keep it a secret while falling in love with a brilliant classmate who inspires him to not be defined by his condition.

name: Alive
summary_text: A Uruguayan rugby team stranded in the snow swept Andes are forced to use desperate measures to survive after a plane crash.

name: Son of the Beach
summary_text: A parody of "Baywatch" featuring Malibu Adjacent's world-famous lifeguard, Notch Johnson.

name: Dr. Stone
summary_text: Awakened into a world where humanity has been petrified, scientific genius Senku and his brawny friend Taiju use their skills to rebuild civilization.

name: RED 2
summary_text: Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

name: A Cure for Wellness
summary_text: An ambitious young executive is sent to retrieve his company's CEO from an idyllic but mysterious "wellness center" at a remote location in the Swiss Alps, but soon suspects that the spa's treatments are not what they seem.

name: SAS: Red Notice
summary_text: A small army of well trained criminals led by Grace Lewis have hijacked a train deep beneath the English Channel.

name: The Lie
summary_text: A father and daughter are on their way to dance camp when they spot the girl's best friend on the side of the road. When they stop to offer the friend a ride, their good intentions soon result in terrible consequences.

name: The Cannonball Run
summary_text: A wide variety of eccentric competitors participate in a wild and illegal cross-country road race. However, the eccentric entrants will do anything to win the road race, including low-down, dirty tricks.

name: In the Line of Fire
summary_text: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan (Clint Eastwood) couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

name: A Place to Call Home
summary_text: A mysterious woman is perched between the harsh legacy of World War II and the hope of a new life in Australia.

name: The Bold and the Beautiful
summary_text: The saga of high fashion glamour, honor, romance, passion, and most importantly, family.

name: On My Block
summary_text: A coming-of-age story about four bright, street-savvy friends navigating their way through high school in the gritty inner city of South Central Los Angeles. Dealing with the danger of getting their friend out of a gang and friends turning into romance, danger is constant.

name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
summary_text: The adventures of a 12 year old who is fresh out of elementary and transitions to middle school, where he has to learn the consequences and responsibility to survive the year.

name: Marie Antoinette
summary_text: The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 15 to her reign as queen at 19 and to the end of her reign as queen, and ultimately the fall of Versailles.

name: Q
summary_text: In a social context deteriorated by a countrywide economic crisis, the life of several people will be turned upside down after they meet Cecile, a character who symbolizes desire.

name: B Positive
summary_text: Drew, a newly divorced dad faced with finding a kidney donor who is at the end of his rope when he runs into Gina (Ashford), a rough-around-the edges woman from his past who volunteers her own.

name: Project Blue Book
summary_text: A tough US Air Force officer and a skeptical scientist investigate UFO and alien conspiracies as Cold War paranoia spreads.

name: Cocoon
summary_text: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigor.

name: Big Daddy
summary_text: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

name: Welcome Back, Kotter
summary_text: A compassionate teacher returns to his inner city high school of his youth to teach a new generation of trouble making kids.

name: Stripes
summary_text: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

name: Walker, Texas Ranger
summary_text: Walker and his partner Trivette are Texas Rangers. They make it their business to battle crime in Dallas and all around the Great State of Texas.

name: My Own Private Idaho
summary_text: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

name: I Still Believe
summary_text: The true-life story of Christian music star Jeremy Camp and his journey of love and loss that looks to prove there is always hope.

name: The Witches of Eastwick
summary_text: Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.

name: Soylent Green
summary_text: A nightmarish futuristic fantasy about the controlling power of big corporations and an innocent cop who stumbles on the truth.

name: Dark City
summary_text: A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from.

name: Trolls
summary_text: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

name: You're the Worst
summary_text: Centers on two toxic, self-destructive people who fall in love and attempt a relationship.

name: Descendants 3
summary_text: The teenagers of Disney's most infamous villains return to the Isle of the Lost to recruit a new batch of villainous offspring to join them at Auradon Prep.

name: The White Queen
summary_text: Three different, yet equally relentless women vie for the throne in 15th-century England.

name: Happy Death Day
summary_text: A college student must relive the day of her murder over and over again, in a loop that will end only when she discovers her killer's identity.

name: Master
summary_text: An alcoholic professor is sent to a juvenile school, where he clashes with a gangster who uses the school children for criminal activities.
